page.title: 09Housing
page.content: This is a scattered, mainly agricultural area of Scotland. In the rural area between Dollar and Muckhart there are family owned farms, each with a large traditional Scottish farm house and one or two smaller farm cottages which in some cases are occuppied by farm hands and in other cases, younger members of the family. At the western end of Muckhart there are 13 houses rented out by Clackmannan District Council. Over the years 4 of these have been purchased by the occupants. It is proposed that approx. 7 houses will be built by the Council in the future. The area supports mainly private housing but no further ground is to be made available in the foreseeable future for housing development of a private nature.
